## Constitution Compliance

- [ ] CHK001 Verify professional excellence standards maintained in all code and design
- [ ] CHK002 Confirm user experience and accessibility follow WCAG guidelines
- [ ] CHK003 Validate all pages load in under 3 seconds (performance requirements)
- [ ] CHK004 Ensure semantic HTML with proper ARIA attributes and keyboard navigation

## Technical Requirements

- [ ] CHK005 Verify compatibility with Nuxt.js 4.x architecture
- [ ] CHK006 Confirm use of Tailwind CSS with primary colors (#2f93ff, #0f70f5)
- [ ] CHK007 Validate dark/light mode functionality using @nuxtjs/color-mode
- [ ] CHK008 Ensure proper SEO implementation (meta tags, schema markup, sitemaps)

## Quality Standards

- [ ] CHK009 Confirm consistent formatting and naming conventions
- [ ] CHK010 Verify components have single responsibilities and are modular
- [ ] CHK011 Test functionality across all major browsers and device sizes
- [ ] CHK012 Validate all code changes preserve existing functionality

## Notes

- Check items off as completed: `[x]`
- Add comments or findings inline
- Link to relevant resources or documentation
- Items are numbered sequentially for easy reference
